summary: This release brings exciting new ways to explore and connect within Grove, introducing the immersive Wander discovery mode and Forests for community gathering. We've strengthened our foundations by migrating to a new payment system and implementing powerful real-time features with Durable Objects. It's all about creating richer, more reliable experiences as we continue to grow the platform together.

features: add Wander - first-person immersive grove discovery
add Forests - community aggregation inspired by GeoCities neighborhoods
add Curios - cabinet of wonders for visitor experience features
migrate payment system from Stripe to Lemon Squeezy
add grove-durable-objects worker for Pages compatibility
implement Durable Objects for caching and real-time features (#311)
add Data Protection section with backup status
fixes: use correct LineSquiggle icon name for Wander drift mode
cast SDK attributes through unknown for TypeScript compatibility
add esbuild dependency for Durable Objects compilation in CI
update status page link to status.grove.place (#323)
revert ThemeToggle from season indicator to light/dark mode toggle (#319)
add type annotation to gallery image map callback
